title: The Exchange: Mike Novogratz
description:
From Goldman Sachs partner to Fortress founder and now bitcoin trader, the chief executive of Galaxy Investment Partners has something of a Midas touch. He swings by Times Square to talk about how he's making a killing with a new hedge fund betting on crypto-currencies.   See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
